extendedInfo.description: **ATTENTION**This is a pack for RingPack. Search "RingPack" in the market.*************This is a collection of short "ping-like" notification tones. It is the same "ping", with varied levels of effects. Credit to dj_blueshift on androidandme.com for the sounds.To install, download, and open. It will automatically install and open RingPack.You are free to delete the pack once installed if you wish to clean up your launcher or save application space. It will remain with RingPack until you manually delete it by longpressing the pack's name in RingPack.
